casebody.data:
WHIRLPOOL CORPORATION, petitioner,
v.
Gina GLAZER and Trina Allison, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated. No. 12-322. Supreme Court of the United States April 1, 2013.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Comcast Corp. v. Behrend, ---U.S. ----, 133 S.Ct. 1426, --- L.Ed. ---- (2013).
